listitem.para: Init a mbox and just invoke k_mbox_data_get() with different input to check robust of API.

briefdescription.para: Test put and get mailbox with block data.

listitem.para: Create two threads to put and get block data with specify thread ID and K_FOREVER for each other.
Check the result after finished exchange.

inbodydescription.para: TESTPOINT: thread-thread data passing via mbox
